description:
Will the starlight twinkling between the fingers cause harm, or is it a warm embrace? Xi Bai and his close friend Chunchun Liu suffered a bizarre car accident. The assistant Zhuo Han who appeared afterwards was actually a personal bodyguard with mysterious abilities. A famous gallery invited Chunchun Liu to open a painting exhibition with excellent conditions. The bodyguard Yuanchen Wang, who appeared afterwards, seemed to have a mysterious past.

With danger lurking on every side of these four men and the exhibition approaching, the truth behind it all slowly begins to surface...

(Source: Bilibili, translated)
